rawContent:
When the mob who are going after the LGBTQ community, including drag performers and trans people, use the rallying cry "protect the children" they're not actually trying to protect children. They're taking away the focus on the real criminals and pedophiles like the ones just arrested. They're watering down the criminal terms that refer to this despicable behaviour. 

The real agenda is to erase the LGBTQ community from visibility. Because queerness and visibility makes them uncomfortable. 

Drag story time has been going on for a decade with no fanfare until recent attempts to portray it as evil and immoral. Pride celebrations have been going on for decades. The abundance of Pride flags in public spaces is largely the result of allies joining in to celebrate Pride and inclusion. 

Now, all of a sudden it's too much, too colorful, and too in their face. They want to gatekeep the amount of skin that is shown in public when kids can see even more skin at public beaches, swimming pools, and online from all genders. Too bad. Please suck it up princesses.

It would be such a pity if your children and grandchildren grew up to being loving and accepting because they were exposed to diversity through seeing representation of the LGBTQ community in public spaces.
